name: Hentai Hunter
description:
• EXPLORE VARIOUS LOCATIONS

Welcome to the fascinating world of 'Hentai Hunter'! Get ready for an unforgettable adventure that will take you on a journey through four mysterious locations: the Sorcerers' Cave, the Fairys' Tower, the Priestesses' Temple, and the Warriors' Castle.

  • FIND THE MAGICAL DOOR THAT LEADS TO SEXY GIRLS

Step into the shoes of a fearless player equipped with a unique backpack and a set of keys. Your goal is to uncover the mysterious doors located within each of these magical locations. But beware, to gain entry, you must match the correct key's color to the respective doors. Will your instincts and skills allow you to overcome these colorful challenges?

  • SEX GAMEPLAY

After passing through the magical doors, you'll encounter one of the charming girls, finding yourself entirely one-on-one in her company.
In each scene the girl has one sexual position, you can interact with the girl using dildos and you can penetrate her. The girl reacts to penetration by moaning. In edit mode, you can modify the lighting settings as you wish.
